properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory.
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.description: Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat. The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine.

A compact but bright top floor flat with an excellent outlook over Green Park in this very central location within an easy walk of the City centre. Offering one small double bedroom, bathroom and living area with kitchen off. The property is unfurnished but provided with white goods and available now. Available from 6th January 2025

One room in a furnished student house share located in Combe Down. Available now. On the ground floor you enter into the open plan living room with kitchen. The kitchen is fitted with oven and hob, fridge freezer, washing machine and dishwasher. There are sliding doors out from the kitchen to the garden. The living room is open plan to kitchen space and has WC.

Newly room available in 2 bedroom flat with spacious living room area and balcony, shared only with one professional female the property located in great residential area, easy access to public transport and shopping supermarket and restaurants

Modern, and in excellent condition 1 BEDROOM, 1 BATHROOM flat in Victoria House. This development is just off Regent Street, close to the city centre & the new Victoria Gate with all the new shops and bars.
properties.location: Skinner Lane, Leeds, West Yorkshire, LS7

properties.description: This charming 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom house, located at Trent House, Silverworks Close, London, NW9, is an ideal opportunity for those seeking a modern home in a sought-after area. Offered for sale with freehold tenure, this property provides a blend of comfort and convenience, making it perfect for first-time buyers or those looking for a hassle-free living experience.
properties.location: Trent House, Silverworks Close, London, NW9

properties.description: Welcome to a desirable collection of one and two bedroom apartments, perfectly placed for those who want all the advantages of living in the capital city, complemented by acres of idyllic green space and blue water.
